ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides linear models based on Theil-Sen single median and Siegel repeated medians. They are very robust (29 or 50 percent breakdown point, respectively), and if no outliers are present, the estimators are very similar to OLS.

Provides linear models based on Theil-Sen single median and Siegel repeated medians. They are very robust (29 or 50 percent breakdown point, respectively), and if no outliers are present, the estimators are very similar to OLS.

name: r-mblm
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.12.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-mblm
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/mblm_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/mblm/mblm_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2b58b5c673aca77b3ed14731aed3f844ecea81cd5d7746c1c8352a9fd75837ba

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('mblm')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('mblm')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://www.r-project.org, http://www.komsta.net/
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Provides linear models based on Theil-Sen single median and Siegel repeated medians.
    They are very robust (29 or 50 percent breakdown point, respectively), and if no
    outliers are present, the estimators are very similar to OLS.
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: mblm
# Type: Package
# Title: Median-Based Linear Models
# Version: 0.12.1
# Date: 2013-12-30
# Author: Lukasz Komsta <lukasz.komsta@umlub.pl>
# Maintainer: Lukasz Komsta <lukasz.komsta@umlub.pl>
# Description: Provides linear models based on Theil-Sen single median and Siegel repeated medians. They are very robust (29 or 50 percent breakdown point, respectively), and if no outliers are present, the estimators are very similar to OLS.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# URL: https://www.r-project.org, http://www.komsta.net/
# Packaged: 2019-01-26 16:15:34 UTC; hornik
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-01-26 16:40:24 UTC
# NeedsCompilation: no
